headline: Galaxy Digital Share Price Dips 14% Despite Strong Q3 Earnings Growth
summary: GLXY posted soaring Q3 earnings and 231% revenue growth, but shares slid 14% as crypto market weakness weighed.

headline: CoreSite Recognized as a Representative Vendor in the 2025 Gartner速 Market Guide for Data Center Colocation
summary: DENVER, October 23, 2025--CoreSite, an American Tower company (NYSE: AMT) empowering critical business and AI workloads that impact everyday life through interconnected data center solutions, today announced that it has been recognized as a Representative Vendor in the 2025 Gartner速 Market Guide for Data Center Colocation.1

headline: Exploring Analyst Estimates for American Tower (AMT) Q3 Earnings, Beyond Revenue and EPS
summary: Get a deeper insight into the potential performance of American Tower (AMT) for the quarter ended September 2025 by going beyond Wall Street's top-and-bottom-line estimates and examining the estimates for some of its key metrics.

headline: Looking at the Changing Narrative for American Tower as Analyst Views Shift
summary: American Tower's consensus analyst price target has shifted lower, falling from $246.32 to $237.95 after a new round of updates. This adjustment reflects more conservative assumptions, as both bullish and cautious analyst perspectives consider sector trends and company fundamentals. Read on to find out how these changing targets can impact investor outlooks and discover some effective ways to stay informed as the narrative evolves.
